name: Marketing iPhone + iPad Games is Hard
blurb: We need money to market our next game, Clown Harder, a Circus Atari remake. We will use money from kickstarter to spread the word on our new game.

rewards.reward: - Name in the Game Credits under Bronze Sponsors\r\n- Clown Harder sticker mailed to you
- Name in the Game Credits under Silver Sponsors\r\n- Clown Harder sticker mailed to you\r\n- Autographed Photo of App Developers in Clown Noses

- Name in the Game Credits under Silver Sponsors
- Clown Harder sticker mailed to you
- Autographed Photo of App Developers in Clown Noses
- .zip file containing all of the vector artwork (under a CC license for you to use) for all of our games so far. Hundreds of hand drawn art.

- Name in the Game Credits under Silver Sponsors
- Clown Harder sticker mailed to you
- Autographed Photo of App Developers in Clown Noses
- .zip file containing all of the vector artwork (under a CC license for you to use) for all of our games so far. Hundreds of hand drawn art.
- Custom Hand-Painted Clown Harder Character, Autographed by Artist and Mailed

- Name in the Game Credits under Gold Sponsors
- Clown Harder sticker mailed to you
- Autographed Photo of App Developers in Clown Noses
- .zip file containing all of the vector artwork (under a CC license for you to use) for all of our games so far. Hundreds of hand drawn art.
- Custom Hand-Painted Clown Harder Character, Autographed by Artist and Mailed 
- Arist will create a digital Caricature of Donater to be put in the Clown Harder Game Background

- .zip file containing all of the vector artwork (under a CC license for you to use) for all of our games so far. Hundreds of hand drawn art.

- Access to a Secret Clown App we designed that will not be available in the app store (Limit to First 20)

- Name in the Game Credits under Platinum Sponsors
- Autographed Photo of App Developers in Clown Noses
- .zip file containing all of the vector artwork (under a CC license for you to use) for all of our games so far. Hundreds of hand drawn art.

- Name and Photo in the Game Credits under Titanium Sponsors
- Clown Harder sticker mailed to you
- Autographed Photo of App Developers in Clown Noses
- .zip file containing all of the vector artwork (under a CC license for you to use) for all of our games so far. Hundreds of hand drawn art.

- Access to a Secret Clown App we designed that will not be available in the app store (Limit to First 20)
- Donater gets to Design a Powerup available in the next game update (subject to developer approval).
- Developers will be available for a working lunch or dinner in Arizona to discuss app development with you. (Yes we will pay for dinner just don't order the lobster.)
